languages.text: The character's STR and TGH are decreased in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.

traits.locale_text: The character's STR and TGH are decreased in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.

languages.text: Reduces the character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g} персонажа в следующем бою будут уменьшены. Это однократный штраф, который исчезнет по завершении боя.

traits.locale_text: The character's Strength and Toughness will be reduced in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.

languages.text: Bir sonraki çatışmada karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} niteliklerini azaltır. Bu ceza puanı tek seferliktir ve çatışma bitince ortadan kalkar.

traits.locale_text: Bir sonraki çatışmada karakterin Kuvvet ve Dayanıklılık niteliklerini azaltır. Bu ceza puanı tek seferliktir ve çatışma bitince ortadan kalkar.

languages.text: Reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} del personaje en el siguiente combate. Esta es una penalización única que desaparece al terminar el combate.

traits.locale_text: Reduce la Fuerza y la Resistencia del personaje en el siguiente combate. Esta es una penalización única que desaparece al terminar el combate.

languages.text: 在下一场战斗中，此角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}降低。此减值效果为一次性效果，会在战斗结束之后消失。
languages.original_text: Reduces the character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.

traits.locale_text: 在下一场战斗中，此角色的力量与坚韧降低。此减值效果为一次性效果，会在战斗结束之后消失。

languages.text: Réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} du personnage lors du prochain combat. Cette pénalité unique disparaît à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 次の戦闘でキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}が低下する。これは1回限定ペナルティで、戦闘終了後に消える。

traits.locale_text: 次の戦闘でキャラクターの腕力と耐久力が低下する。これは1回限定ペナルティで、戦闘終了後に消える。
